product_name: Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Thermal Toe Covers
long_description: Give your toes some love on cold, wet, windy days with the weather-resistant Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Thermal toe covers. Their easy-on design is compatible with both road and mountain bike shoes. P.R.O. soft-shell fabric provides optimal wind and water resistance. Innovative power band secures front of shoe cover under toes. Kevlar(R) bottom with rip-and-stick closure allows easy on and off. Reflective elements add visibility in low-light conditions. For compatibility with X-Alp shoes, use Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Thermal toe covers that are one size larger than your shoe size.
short_description: Give your toes some love on cold, wet, windy days with the weather-resistant Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Thermal toe covers. Their easy-on design is compatible with both road and mountain bike shoes.
